casebody.data:
STATE
v.
GRATE 2018-0968 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 17, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellant's motion for extension of time to transmit the record. Motion granted. The record is ordered to be filed no later than January 14, 2019. No additional motions for extension of time to transmit the record shall be filed.
